name: Darkest Day
description:
The objective is to fuel 200 wooden pieces in the furnace (top-left machine) to restore the light and win the game.

You can upgrade your speed, backpack, torch light time and buy an infinite battery lamp in the upgrade machine(top-right machine).
You die if your torch stops burning, so, try to approach the campfire.

Use W,A,S,D to move.

Design and programmer: William Rizzi.

Artist: Leonardo Martinez
